Build/Buy Event Types¶

S4CLBuildBuyEnterEvent¶

class S4CLBuildBuyEnterEvent(zone: zone.Zone)¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.events.event_handling.common_event.CommonEvent

An Event that Occurs upon entering Build/Buy on a lot.

property zone¶

The zone being modified.

S4CLBuildBuyExitEvent¶

class S4CLBuildBuyExitEvent(zone: zone.Zone)¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.events.event_handling.common_event.CommonEvent

An Event that Occurs upon exiting Build/Buy on a lot.

property zone¶

The zone that was modified.
